comment: So many Whites are just lost: living under gross moralistic illusions about reality, alienated from their own identities (and kinship, always the correlative) and thus deteriorating in bondage to their enemies, the orcs and archons of the Demiurgic System. As Heidegger wrote, Only a God can save us.

As Heidegger wrote, Only a God can save us.
